name: Pixzards
description:
The goal is simple: Bring down the opponent(s)! To achieve that you have to pick one of the three available wizard classes and use their abilities to either damage enemies or support your teammates.

Features:

- Local Multiplayer

- 1v1 or XvX battles

- 3 wizard classes

So far, the game contains only PvP mode, however solo mode is in development and will be available soon.
